SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: PROVIDING TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE AND ADVISORY SERVICES TO ASSIST OTHER CHARITIES IN CARRYING OUT THEIR EXEMPT PURPOSES.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: ENGAGING SPECIALISTS WITH SUBJECT-MATTER EXPERTISE (I.E. TOBACCO, CLIMATE, ETC.) TO ASSIST THE FOUNDATION AND OTHER CHARITY PARTNERS WITH PROGRAMMATIC PROJECTS (E.G., DATA COLLECTION, REPORT PRODUCTION, ETC.).
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description3Txt: PROVIDING TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE AND ADVISORY SERVICES, AND ENGAGING SPECIALISTS WITH PUBLIC SERVICE EXPERTISE, TO ASSIST MUNICIPALITIES AND GOVERNMENTS IN CARRYING OUT THEIR PUBLIC EXEMPT PURPOSES.

RlnOfActyToAccomOfExmptPrpsGrp.RelationshipStatementTxt: INCOME REFLECTED IN COLUMN E REPRESENTS INTEREST INCOME FROM STATE AND LOCAL BONDS FROM PASS THROUGH ENTITIES WHICH IS EXCLUDED FROM TAX PURSUANT TO SECTION 103 OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE.

ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO STRENGTHEN SMALL AND MID SIZED ARTS ORGANIZATIONS; $6,665,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/20. THE ORIGINAL GRANT DATED 03/01/18 WAS AMENDED ON 02/11/2021 REDUCING THE GRANT AMOUNT FROM $9,589,000 TO $6,665,000 AND REDUCED GRANT TERM END DATE FROM 04/30/2022 TO 08/31/2020.

TO SUPPORT AIMS AND OBJECTIVES OF THE BLOOMBERG PHILANTHROPIES PUBLIC HEALTH PROGRAM; THE ORIGINAL GRANT DATED 11/13/15 WAS AMENDED ON 1/31/19 AND 10/5/20; $1,689,884 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/20. AMENDED ON 01/01/2021 EXTENDING GRANT TO 12/31/2022. DATES OF REPORTS BY GRANTEE: 2/28/16 8/31/16 2/28/17 9/15/17 12/31/17 2/15/19 9/15/19 1/31/20 10/31/20 2/15/21 1/31/22

A LOAN FOR PORTABLE SOLAR LIGHTING AND POWER PRODUCTS FOR OFF-GRID CONSUMERS. $4,000,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/16. THE ORIGINAL LOAN DATED 04/01/14 WAS SUBSEQUENTLY AMENDED ON 5/29/15, 10/04/17 AND 08/23/2019 WHEREAS THE LAST AMENDMENT EXTENDED THE REPAYMENT TERM TO 12/31/2025. IN 2018, AN ALLOWANCE OF $3,874,385 WAS APPLIED BASED ON AN ASSESSMENT OF LOAN COLLECTABILITY.
TO CREATE ECONOMIC OPPORTUNITY FOR WOMEN IN RWANDA AND THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF CONGO. $750,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/2020.
CAREER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION; $5,000,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/20. AMENDED ON 09/09/21 EXTENDING GRANT TO 06/30/2021 AND RECOGNIZING THAT ENTITY NOW HAS PUBLIC CHARITY STATUS.

GeneralExplanationGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990-PF, PAGE 1, LINE 6A COLUMN (A) AND LINE 6B
GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: GROSS SALES PRICE FOR ALL ASSETS ON LINE 6A AS REPORTED ON LINE 6B OF $0 INCLUDE ONLY DIRECT SALES OF ASSETS OWNED BY THE BLOOMBERG FAMILY FOUNDATION INC. NET GAIN FROM SALES ON ASSETS OF $1,010,358,590 AS REPORTED ONLINE 6A COLUMN (A) INCLUDES PASS THRU GAINS AS FOLLOWS: THRU PARTNERSHIP INVESTMENTS 1,010,358,590. TOTAL REPORTED ON LINE 6A COLUMN (A) 1,010,358,590.SINCE THE PASS THRU ENTITIES DO NOT REPORT ALLOCABLE SALES PROCEEDS, LINE 6B DOES NOT INCLUDE ANY ALLOCABLE SHARE OF GROSS PROCEEDS FROM THE SALES THAT GENERATED FLOW THRU GAINS REPORTED ON LINE 6A.
